author: Special Correspondent
text: The government employees affiliated to Tamil Nadu Government Employees’ Association continued with their indefinite strike. The agitators assembled at the Collectorate and expressed disappointment over the non-announcement of their demands being met in the ongoing Assembly session. A large posse of police force was deployed. Raising slogans in support of their 20-point demands, the members charged the government for the inconvenience caused to the public who visited the offices for getting various works done and termed the government as ‘irresponsible.’
title: Government employees continue indefinite strike
